title: The Big Britney Spears/Bill Cosby Mix-Up | 7/1/21
description:
Stu and Pat discuss how Bill Cosby was released from prison, but Britney Spears’ plea to end her conservatorship was denied. Tragedy struck Florida when a condo building collapsed, and of course climate change is being tossed around as a possible cause. Democrats have been wrong about climate change for decades, but somehow, they’re always right. What is Bobby Bonilla Day and why is he paid so much every year? China has a death grip on American celebrities. New York City’s mayoral primary is hitting a major snag, and officials are blaming the voting system instead of their own incompetence. Trump visited the border, and he had a lot to say, while CNN’s Jim Acosta has lost his fame. We’re getting a January 6th Commission after all.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
